projects.title: E-Commerce Website (Shoes store)
projects.detail: This E-Commerce website was developed as a Capstone project, and I worked on it independently. Its main purpose is to provide users with a modern UI for a smooth shopping and payment experience. The platform also enables sellers to efficiently manage inventory and sales through a dedicated dashboard with real-time Telegram order alerts.
features: Build an admin dashboard secured via role-based access to manage client web page such as CRUD operations for billboard, product, delivery, category, order and customer.
Real-time inventory & sales analytics ensured stock accuracy to the second, reducing overselling risks.
Telegram bot alerts each new order so staff can pack items minutes after checkout.
Implemented Cloudinary multi-image uploads with signed URLs for secure product/billboard management.
Build an Favorite feature to save favorite products for quick access.
Delivered a seamless UX with dynamic order tracking, cart persistence, and a responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

projects.title: Book Ticket Website
projects.detail: This ticket booking platform was developed independently as a Capstone project. It streamlines the process of booking bus tickets online by providing real-time seat availability, secure authentication, and integrated payment processing.
features: Built an admin dashboard with CRUD operations for routes, schedules, and tickets, secured via role-based access (Auth.js)
Implemented real-time seat availability and booking management.
Integrated secure payment processing with Stripe (testing model) for transactions and stored image on Cloudinary.
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
Fully responsive design for all devices

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.detail: The Social Media App was developed during my internship, and I worked on it independently. The main purpose of this project is to provide users with a platform to connect, share, and interact with friends and family. The app offers features such as user profiles, messaging, and a feed to keep users updated on their friends' activities.
features: Create, edit and delete posts
View other users's posts and comments
Allow user to like and comment on other users' posts
User authentication and profile management
Responsive design for all devices

projects.title: Fitness App
projects.detail: The Fitness App was developed during my internship, and I worked on it independently. The main goal of this project is to guide users on how to work out correctly by providing proper exercise instructions and demonstrations..
features: Free to access
Use the fitness exercise api from RapidAPI to show the exercises on the screen.
Ui responsiv base on mobile and teblet.
View detail of each exercise.

projects.title: POS System
projects.detail: The POS System was developed as a full-stack application to provide solutions for small businesses. It enables users to manage order processing, stock products, create invoices, record sales, print receipts, and ensure login security.
features: User authentication and role-based access
Inventory management with real-time updates
Sales tracking and reporting
Invoice generation and printing
Customer management system

projects.title: Thread clone
projects.detail: Thread Clone was built for practicing both front-end with reactJs and back-end with ExpressJs and MySQL. The functionality of this project features like includes Login and Sign-Up security, implementation on creating and editing posts, and also checking posted history.
features: User authentication system
Create, edit and delete posts
Like and comment functionality
User profile management
Responsive design for all devices

education.name: Royal University of Phnom Penh
education.detail: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology Engineering at the Royal University of Phnom Penh. As a senior student who has completed six semesters, I have built a strong foundation in core subjects such as Data Structures and Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Discrete Mathematics, Basic and Advanced Programming Languages, and Project Practicum, among others.

education.name: Australian Centre For Education (ACE)
education.detail: Currently, my General English program is GEP-8, which focuses on reading, listening, writing and speaking skills.

education.name: Koh Sdach High School
education.detail: I have completed my grade 12 at Koh Sdach high school. My achievement includes received a Grade B on the Nation Exam, 2nd place in the Mathematic Genius Student Award and selected as a Class Monitor for grade 10, 11 and 12.
